channel.title: 2012s on Pavel Nikolov's blog
channel.description: Recent content in 2012s on Pavel Nikolov's blog

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Why now? It is never too late to start your own blog. After several unsuccessful attempts with blogging I decided to start again. I already had the domain name so it took me less than an hour to set up this site. In this blog I will share challenges that I face with my everyday software development work, ideas about new projects and new technologies. In addition to that, hopefully, I will get lots of feedback through comments and connect with people having the same interests.
